frontmatter.title: An Introduction to Neural Networks
frontmatter.description: Walking through the brain, artificially speaking.

frontmatter.title: This was not written by GPT-3
frontmatter.description: From my viewpoint, GPT-3 should not scare us. It is an opportunity.

frontmatter.title: Black Lives Matter
frontmatter.description: I have a lot to say but now is not the time for my voice. Every day we should be amplifying and giving space to Black voices but especially now because the movement has more momentum than it has had since the 60s and 70s. Keep that energy going. Liberation happens collectively.
